title: Put into lower queue
body: Well the LoL(new) client crashed on me for 3 times and i got put in a Lower queue i just think its sadthat i player should be punished fro something that they had no control over at all

replies.body:
While it definitely sucks to get put in an LPQ for something you feel that was beyond your control, those other 4 players that were left without a full team probably had no way to come back from that shift in balance, which is why we have the system set up the way it is. 

Without having much context on what happened that ended up crashing your client, there's not much that I can go off of to troubleshoot. I can help troubleshoot if you can give me a little more info as to what happened before the crash.
